    Yexin Li

    Researcher at the Multi-Agent System Lab, Beijing Institute for General Artificial Intelligence.

    üòÄ ¬†¬† About Me

    I am a researcher at the Multi-Agent System Lab, Beijing Institute for General Artificial Intelligence. My research interests include multi-agent systems, reinforcement learning, large language models, and spatio-temporal data mining.

    I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology under the supervision of Prof. Qiang Yang and Dr. Yu Zheng. My work has been published in top-tier conferences such as ICML, ICLR, ACL, KDD, and CIKM, as well as leading journals including TKDE, Transportation Research Part C.
